abstract: With French film and television production in the doldrums, Paris-based animation and visual effects studios like Mac Guff Ligne are looking to Hollywood for new business.
snippet: With French film and television production in the doldrums, Paris-based animation and visual effects studios like Mac Guff Ligne are looking to Hollywood for new business.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — The natural habitat of the Lorax, the fantastical protagonist of Dr. Seuss’ environmental fable, is a forest. For the moment, however, the Lorax lives atop a parking garage in central Paris.

headline.main: Hollywood Animation With a Decidedly French Flavor
headline.print_headline: French Special Effects Find Audience in U.S.

abstract: By the time the movie arrives in theaters in December, Walt Disney Studios will have spent three and a half years promoting it.
snippet: By the time the movie arrives in theaters in December, Walt Disney Studios will have spent three and a half years promoting it.
lead_paragraph: SAN DIEGO  The futuristic movie “Tron: Legacy” is not just pushing the boundaries of special effects. It is redefining the Hollywood hard sell.

headline.main: Marketing ‘Tron: Legacy’ Brings the Hardest Sell Yet
headline.print_headline: Marketing ‘Tron: Legacy’ Brings the Hardest Sell Yet

abstract: A rival investment group faces a Wednesday deadline for $40 million and a restructuring plan.
snippet: A rival investment group faces a Wednesday deadline for $40 million and a restructuring plan.
lead_paragraph: An investment group that includes the construction executive Ronald N. Tutor must make a nonrefundable $40 million payment toward the purchase of Miramax Films from the Walt Disney Company by Wednesday, or see the bidding again thrown open to other suitors, possibly including the Miramax co-founders Bob and Harvey Weinstein, according to people who were briefed on the prospective sale.

headline.main: A Miramax Deadline Could Re-Open Door for Weinsteins

byline.original: By Michael Cieply and Brooks Barnes

abstract: A consortium has until Wednesday to come up with a down payment for Miramax Films, or Disney could reopen the bidding.
snippet: A consortium has until Wednesday to come up with a down payment for Miramax Films, or Disney could reopen the bidding.
lead_paragraph: From Michael Cieply and Brooks Barnes at Media Decoder:

headline.main: Miramax Deadline Could Reopen Door for Weinsteins

abstract: A consortium has until Wednesday to come up with a down payment for Miramax Films, or Disney could reopen the bidding.
snippet: A consortium has until Wednesday to come up with a down payment for Miramax Films, or Disney could reopen the bidding.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  An investment group that includes the construction executive Ronald N. Tutor must make a nonrefundable $40 million payment toward the purchase of Miramax Films from the Walt Disney Company by Wednesday to move forward with a deal, according to people briefed on the sale.

headline.main: Disney Seeks $40 Million in Advance on Miramax
headline.print_headline: Disney Seeks $40 Million In Advance On Miramax

byline.original: By Michael Cieply and Brooks Barnes
